content: <ns0:DIF xmlns:ns0="http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/"          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"          xsi:schemaLocation="http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/ http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/dif_v9.4.xsd">    <ns0:Entry_ID>bgs.nerc.ac.uk:DIF:BGS_CMD_REF464</ns0:Entry_ID>    <ns0:Entry_Title>Marine Aggregate Levy Sustainability Fund (MALSF) Sampling Survey 2004/6_MEPF: MALSF Outer Bristol Channel Marine Habitat Study (26/Jul/2004 to 29/Jul/2004)</ns0:Entry_Title>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>NDGO0001</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>Geology</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>soil and sediment crust</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:Parameters>       <ns0:Category/>       <ns0:Topic/>       <ns0:Term>Lithology</ns0:Term>    </ns0:Parameters>    <ns0:ISO_Topic_Category>geoscientificInformation</ns0:ISO_Topic_Category>    <ns0:Keyword>NDGO0001</ns0:Keyword>    <ns0:Keyword>Geology</ns0:Keyword>    <ns0:Keyword>soil and sediment crust</ns0:Keyword>    <ns0:Keyword>Lithology</ns0:Keyword>    <Source_Name xmlns="http://gcmd.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aboutus/xml/dif/">       <Short_Name>NOTE! This GCMD DIF has been produced automatically from ISO19139 MEDIN v2.3 profile.  Not all MEDIN info is reproduced here - this conversion is intended to provide basic information to be reproduced in the NDG/MEDIN discovery service</Short_Name>    </Source_Name>    <ns0:Temporal_Coverage>       <ns0:Start_Date>2004-07-26</ns0:Start_Date>       <ns0:Stop_Date>2004-07-29</ns0:Stop_Date>    </ns0:Temporal_Coverage>    <ns0:Spatial_Coverage>       <ns0:Southernmost_Latitude>51.3971</ns0:Southernmost_Latitude>       <ns0:Northernmost_Latitude>51.5927</ns0:Northernmost_Latitude>       <ns0:Westernmost_Longitude>-4.8720</ns0:Westernmost_Longitude>       <ns0:Easternmost_Longitude>-4.1932</ns0:Easternmost_Longitude>    </ns0:Spatial_Coverage>    <ns0:Data_Center>       <ns0:Data_Center_Name>          <ns0:Short_Name>British Geological Survey (BGS)</ns0:Short_Name>       </ns0:Data_Center_Name>       <ns0:Personnel>          <ns0:Role>custodian</ns0:Role>          <ns0:Last_Name/>       </ns0:Personnel>    </ns0:Data_Center>    <ns0:Data_Center>       <ns0:Data_Center_Name>          <ns0:Short_Name>Marine Aggregate Levy Sustainability Fund</ns0:Short_Name>       </ns0:Data_Center_Name>       <ns0:Personnel>          <ns0:Role>originator</ns0:Role>          <ns0:Last_Name/>       </ns0:Personnel>    </ns0:Data_Center>    <ns0:Data_Center>       <ns0:Data_Center_Name>          <ns0:Short_Name>British Geological Survey (BGS)</ns0:Short_Name>       </ns0:Data_Center_Name>       <ns0:Personnel>          <ns0:Role>distributor</ns0:Role>          <ns0:Last_Name/>       </ns0:Personnel>    </ns0:Data_Center>    <ns0:Summary>This National Museum of Wales (NMW) sampling survey took place in July 2004 in the Outer Bristol Channel aboard the RV Noctiluca. This survey was undertaken for the Outer Bristol Channel Marine Habitat Study (OBCMHS) as part of a series of five surveys. The OBCMHS was principally funded by the Aggregate Levy Sustainability Fund, MALSF, (administered in Wales by the Welsh Assembly Government), the Sustainable Land Won and Marine Dredged Aggregate Minerals Programme of the Office of the Deputy Prime Minister (ODPM), administered by Mineral Industry Research Organisation (MIRO), with contributions from others. Seabed samples were collected using a Van Veen Grab. These data are archived with the MEDIN Data Archive Centres (DAC), including the BGS DAC for geology and the DASSH DAC for biological data. For further information on the surveys and general information on the OBCMHS see the final report (Mackie et al, 2006. BIOMOR Reports 4:ISBN 0-7200-0569-8).</ns0:Summary>    <ns0:Related_URL>       <ns0:URL>http://www.bgs.ac.uk/GeoIndex/offshore.htm</ns0:URL>    </ns0:Related_URL>    <ns0:Metadata_Name>9.4</ns0:Metadata_Name>    <ns0:Metadata_Version>[CEOS IDN DIF]</ns0:Metadata_Version>    <ns0:DIF_Creation_Date>2004-07-29</ns0:DIF_Creation_Date> </ns0:DIF>
